title: Australia gives Twitter legal notice to clean up online hate content
description: The social media site has less than a month to respond or face fines of AU$700,000 ($474,670) a day.

title: Chatbot showdown: ChatGPT, Google Bard, and Bing Chat put to a real-world test

title: This $20 multitool has 15 functions, and it fits on your key ring
description: The problem with multitools is that they are so big you leave them at home, or so small they are useless. This one sits perfectly in the middle.

title: Amazon 'tricked and trapped' millions into Prime subscriptions, says FTC

title: Widespread adoption of generative AI tools is derailing responsible AI efforts
description: The rapid pace of AI advancements is creating 'shadow AI' -- making it harder to use AI responsibly, a study out of MIT Sloan Management Review and BCG warns.
